rules.description: Hyper Key: Tab (held down) → left control + left command (⌃⌘)
Use Option + spacebar to switch between input sources
Home End PageUp PageDown to resize windows
Use right_command + J/K to switch between tabs in applications
SpaceFN: Space+[hjkl] to Left, Down, Up, Right
Change right_shift to f20 if pressed alone.
Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to F19 for language switch if pressed alone. Not for iTerm2
Use right_command + J/K to switch between tabs in applications
Use R_Cmd + 1/2/3/4 to switch language to English, Chinese, Japanese(Hirakana), Japanese(Katakana), respectively.
